friction: Operational exports in CargoWise (Universal XML/CSV) do not align with NetSuite's strict Journal Entry or Bill schemas.
solution: DocStandard normalizes CargoWise XML into NetSuite-aligned CSV/JSON files, mapping VAT, currency, and GL codes at the line level.
technicalData:
SOURCESYSTEM TARGETFIELDERP FIELDNORMALIZATION LOGIC
CargoWiseNetSuiteUniversalShipment XMLMaps to Transaction.SalesOrderParses XML header for OrderDate and CustomerID; validates against NetSuite Entity list.
CargoWiseNetSuiteInterimReceiptMaps to ItemReceipt.LineItemExtracts received quantities and matches against open PO lines; flags over-receipts.
CargoWiseNetSuiteVGM_SubmissionMaps to CustomRecord.VGMNormalizes weight fields and verifies carrier reference IDs before posting.
CargoWiseNetSuiteARInvoice MappingMaps to Transaction.InvoiceValidates invoice totals and currency codes; enforces GL segment mapping.
CargoWiseNetSuiteSuiteTalk SOAPMaps to SOAP.RecordRefResolves internal IDs for Customer and Subsidiary; enforces role permissions.
CargoWiseNetSuiteRESTlet JSONMaps to RESTlet.PayloadTransforms JSON keys to NetSuite field IDs; validates required fields.
CargoWiseNetSuiteInternalID MappingMaps to InternalIDCrosswalks external reference IDs to NetSuite internal IDs; de-duplicates records.

friction: Magaya invoice exports often require manual re-keying to handle multi-currency accessorials in QuickBooks Online/Desktop.
solution: We transform raw Magaya data into QuickBooks-ready import templates, preserving all charge-level detail without manual entry.
technicalData:
SOURCESYSTEM TARGETFIELDERP FIELDNORMALIZATION LOGIC
MagayaQuickBooksMagaya XMLMaps to Invoice.LineItemExtracts charge codes and maps to QB Item Service list; splits tax lines automatically.
MagayaQuickBooksWarehouseReceiptMaps to Bill.LineItemNormalizes vendor IDs and receipt dates; validates SKU against QuickBooks items.
MagayaQuickBooksCargoReleaseMaps to SalesReceiptConverts release charges into QB sales receipts; validates currency and customer.
MagayaQuickBooksPackingList MappingMaps to ItemReceiptAggregates quantities by SKU; enforces unit-of-measure consistency.

Motive (ELD)SAPBAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POSTMaps to SAP RecordNormalizes BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST fields; validates required identifiers before import.
